issues.title: Stage 2: Define SQLAlchemy models for User, Job, Clip, Setting
issues.body:
## Goal
Implement initial SQLAlchemy 2.0 models in `packages/database/models.py`.

## Scope
- Create `User`, `Job`, `Clip`, and `Setting` tables
- Define relationship mapping and indexes
- Align status enum/constraints with Stage 2 plan

## Acceptance Criteria
- Models import without runtime errors
- Relationships and constraints are explicit
- Ready for Alembic autogenerate

issues.title: Stage 2: Add Alembic setup and initial migration
issues.body:
## Goal
Initialize Alembic and create first migration from ORM models.

## Scope
- Add Alembic config and env
- Generate initial migration revision
- Ensure SQLite DB file location matches app data runtime path

## Acceptance Criteria
- `alembic upgrade head` succeeds
- Database schema matches models
- Migration files committed and documented

issues.title: Stage 2: Implement async DB session manager
issues.body:
## Goal
Provide shared async session helper in `packages/database/session.py`.

## Scope
- Async engine + session factory
- Context manager helper (`async with` style)
- Safe close/rollback handling

## Acceptance Criteria
- Can be imported by API and worker
- Handles rollback on exceptions
- Includes minimal unit test coverage

issues.title: Stage 2: Implement CRUD helper module for jobs and clips
issues.body:
## Goal
Centralize DB operations in `packages/database/crud.py`.

## Scope
- Create helper functions: `create_job`, `update_job_status`, `get_clips_by_job`, etc.
- Keep DB logic out of route handlers

## Acceptance Criteria
- CRUD operations tested with SQLite
- API layer can reuse helpers directly
- No direct SQL scattered in routers

issues.title: Stage 2: Bootstrap FastAPI master app with lifecycle hooks
issues.body:
## Goal
Create base app in `services/api/main.py` for Stage 2.

## Scope
- FastAPI app initialization
- CORS setup
- Startup/shutdown hooks
- Bind rules default to localhost

## Acceptance Criteria
- App starts without error
- Health endpoint or startup log exists
- Router registration pattern established

issues.title: Stage 2: Add jobs router endpoints (create/list/detail/status)
issues.body:
## Goal
Implement `services/api/routers/jobs.py` endpoints.

## Scope
- `POST /jobs`
- `GET /jobs`
- `GET /jobs/{id}`
- `GET /jobs/{id}/status`

## Acceptance Criteria
- Endpoints return typed responses
- Validation and error handling included
- Connected to DB layer and queue entry point

issues.title: Stage 2: Add clips router for list and preview metadata
issues.body:
## Goal
Implement `services/api/routers/clips.py` endpoints.

## Scope
- `GET /clips/{job_id}`
- `GET /clips/{id}/preview`

## Acceptance Criteria
- Response schema defined
- Missing clip/job handled cleanly
- Works with DB CRUD helpers

issues.title: Stage 2: Add WebSocket progress channel by job id
issues.body:
## Goal
Implement realtime progress endpoint in `services/api/routers/ws.py`.

## Scope
- `ws://localhost:8000/ws/{job_id}`
- Broadcast stage and progress updates
- Handle disconnect/reconnect behavior

## Acceptance Criteria
- Frontend can subscribe per job
- Message format is documented
- No server crash on broken connection

issues.title: Stage 2: Add settings router with encrypted API key update
issues.body:
## Goal
Implement `services/api/routers/settings.py` for app config management.

## Scope
- `GET /settings`
- `PUT /settings`
- `POST /settings/api-key` (encrypted storage)

## Acceptance Criteria
- Uses existing `ConfigManager`
- API key is encrypted at rest
- Validation and error messages are user-friendly

issues.title: Stage 2: Implement in-process JobQueueManager + checkpoint base
issues.body:
## Goal
Create queue core in `services/worker/queue_manager.py` and checkpoint skeleton in `services/worker/checkpoint.py`.

## Scope
- Async queue with concurrency=1 default
- Enqueue, cancel, reorder primitives
- Basic checkpoint save/load structure per job

## Acceptance Criteria
- Queue processes sequentially
- Checkpoint file path follows project conventions
- Foundation ready for resume and resource guard integration
